backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, resident records, and clinical data storage with access control checks and various ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend component paths to their summaries for documentation or tooling use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables, dark mode values, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, profile setup flow, and root application shell.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays resident ADL records in a table and provides a button to add new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating a new ADL record with required fields and submission via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Reusable screen showing an access-denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A modal form that collects user profile details, including name, role, and optional related resident IDs, then saves the profile via a mutation.
Provides the main app layout with login handling, header, footer, and conditional login view using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident's MAR records with medication lookup and optionally allows adding new records via a modal.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal for adding a new MAR record, allowing selection of active medications and entering administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Shows a resident’s medications with details, supports adding, editing, and discontinuing medications when permitted.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal for creating a new medication with dosage, administration details, times, physician, and notes, then submitting to the backend.
Modal form for editing an existing medication, handling field updates, administration times, validation, and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal for creating a new resident with detailed inputs for personal info, physicians, contacts, medications, pharmacy, and insurance, then submitting via mutation.
Modal for editing an existing resident’s core information, physicians, and pharmacy data, validating inputs and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a multi‑page printable resident profile report including demographics, insurance, physicians, and medication details.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a resident’s recorded daily vitals in a table and provides an option to open a modal to add new vitals.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for entering and submitting a new set of daily vital signs with validation and mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, and related stats using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode theming, and print-specific styles.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Contains helper functions for checking user permissions and mapping user types to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Implements the resident management dashboard with filters, stats, and actions such as adding, discharging, and deleting residents.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Displays detailed resident information with access control, editing, printing options, and clinical tabs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store and retrieve them from sessionStorage, persist URL-derived values, and remove parameters from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, issues, and feature requests related to fixing backend handling of missing admin tokens during initialization.
